title: Red X Revolution
description: Far in the future, America has turned into a dystopian society under the control of the oppressive Common Party (CP). Baron Kovsky, a clever smuggler, joins an elite group of rebels to expose the CP’s darkest secrets and restore democracy in America before it’s too late. Baron and the rebels soon realize they are not the only ones trying to usurp the CP. A resistance group called the Red X Army is rising in power under the leadership of Jet Bolt, a master orator with strange ideologies and a thirst for power. Caught in-between the CP and the Red X Army, Baron Kovsky must uncover locked away secrets, forgotten love, and bring to light the ultimate price of revolution, all under the watchful eye of the true puppeteers.
author: James  Farris
